ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِهِۦ صَفًّا كَأَنَّهُم بُنْيَٰنٌ مَّرْصُوصٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah loves those who fight in His Way in ranks like well-built walls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely God loves those who fight in His cause in full formations as though they were a compact wall.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah indeed loves those who fight in His Way as though they are a solid wall cemented with molten lead.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God loves those who fight for His cause in battlefield formations firm as an unbreakable concrete wall.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed Allah likes those who fight in His cause, positioned in rows, as if they were an edifice fortified.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, Allah loves those who fight in His cause in rows as if they were a solid structure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely Allah loves those who fight in His way in ranks as if they were a firm and compact wall.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God loves those who fight in His way in ranks, as though they were a building well-compacted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! Allah loveth them who battle for His cause in ranks, as if they were a solid structure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: surely, God loves those who fight for His cause in ranks, as if they were a solid cemented structure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily Allah loveth those who fight in His way drown up in ranks, as though they were a structure well compacted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed Allah loves those who fight in His way in ranks, as if they were a compact structure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Truly Allah loves those who fight in His Cause in battle array, as if they were a solid cemented structure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, Allah loves those who fight in His Cause in rows (ranks) as if they were a solid structure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah loves those who fight in His Way lining up as if they were a stacked building.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God loves those who fight in His cause, in ranks, as though they were a compact structure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, Allah loves those who fight in His cause in a row as though they are a [single] structure joined firmly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [61:4]   Indeed God loves, He assists and honours, those who fight for His cause in ranks (saffan is a circumstantial qualifier, in other words [understand it as] sāffīna), as if they were a solid structure, with all of its parts compacted together, firm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then He encouraged them to strive in His way, saying: (Lo! Allah loveth those who battle for His cause) in His obedience (in ranks, as if they were a solid structure) like a cemented block.
